course.subject: MATH
course.name: Independent Study: Predict Air Quality by Using Machine Learning Technique
course.description: As the two most notorious ambient pollutants, O3 and PM2.5, exert adverse health impacts on human beings. It is still unclear how these two pollutants change under the climate change scenario. In this study, the student needs first to apply the KZ filter to de-trend the air quality time series. The purpose of processing this step is to remove the noise from the time series. The second step is to build up the relationship between the air quality time series and the meteorological time series. We expect to quantify the climate impacts on the air quality via this project. The student should seek the course instructor's approval to take this course.

reviews.author: mhuae
reviews.comment_content: Self study machine learning technique to retrieve air quality data. I have done UROP 1100 and UROP 2100 in the previous semesters. This course is to finish the project and complete a paper based on the study.
reviews.comment_grading: It is a project orientated course, so the grade is quite good. I have not received the grade yet, but I thnk it is not so bad.
reviews.comment_workload: In the first half of semester the workload is quite heavy. I did a lot of research and completed the first draft of paper. But the later the workload is acceptable.
